programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep33
programme.desc: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind - When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep7
programme.desc: Tears Of Balmera - Hunk and Coran search for a new power crystal on a living planet inhabited by an alien race imprisoned by Zarkon.Back at the Castle, Pidge sabotages Sendak's efforts to steal Voltron.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep33
programme.desc: Munk History / Happy Howl Day - Grug tries to solve the mystery of where Munk's family is /Eep refuses to join in when Ahhh! Valley celebrates their first holiday, Howl Day

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep7
programme.desc: A Wanderer in Paris - Odlulu has a magical shrinking key in France and has set her sights on the Great Race. Wally and Wenda help local racer Jacques after Odlulu shrunk his and everyone else's bikes.

programme.title: Olivia Ep13
programme.desc: Olivia And Grandma's Visit - Grandma is coming to visit, and Olivia couldn't be more excited. She's less excited, however, about having to give up her bedroom and bunk with Ian. But when Grandma invites Olivia to share her room for a sleepover, Olivia finds out that rooming with her snoring grandmother isn't as much fun as she thought!

programme.title: Olivia Ep14
programme.desc: Olivia Is Invited To Dinner - Olivia is thrilled to be invited to Francine's for dinner, until she learns that she must reciprocate with an invitation. She worries that Francine will be unimpressed by her family's casual table manners. But after dinner at Francine's proves not to be much fun, Olivia appreciates her own lively family dinners.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep13
programme.desc: Marsha Wonderful Life - Marsha overhears the others saying she is too bossy. She decides that Silver hatch would be a better place without her. Chaos swiftly ensues, can Marsha be persuaded to stay, they can't cope without her!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Hear It For Big Chris - Big Chris is working on Loada while the others plan a surprise evening for him for being the longest serving member of Silver hatch

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep13
programme.desc: Why Vulture Is Bald - You see there was time when Vulture was not bald. Oh no, Vulture's head was covered in a beautiful crown of golden plumage! Vain Vulture never shut up about her golden feathers and was obsessed about making them as golden as the sun!'. One day Vulture decides to fly up to the sun, but her precious feathers get burnt! Vulture decides to sooth her smoking feathers with golden honey which she steals from the bees. The bees are not pleased and Vulture sticks her head down Aardvark's burrow. However, Aardvark loves feathers all covered in honey and when Vulture surfaces she is as bald as well, as a Vulture! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but shes not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now its up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep6
programme.desc: A Ball-For-All - It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep6
programme.desc: Gone Gustav Gone - When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep11
programme.desc: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues - Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep19
programme.desc: Missing Marcus / The Baby-glitters Club - When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a family fairy means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep19
programme.desc: Missing Marcus / The Baby-glitters Club - When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a family fairy means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep15
programme.desc: Gimme, Gimme, Gimme: The Game - King Julien becomes so enthralled with the idea of money that he introduces it to the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep16
programme.desc: Body Double - In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girls plans to attend the Governors Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep8
programme.desc: Tuskist / Three Moon Festival - Scallop is afraid of her first tuskist appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelps first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep19
programme.desc: Missing Marcus / The Baby-glitters Club - When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a family fairy means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math / Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise / Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep48
programme.desc: Apple of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far

programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica... IN COLOR! - When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpas pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppas ball blows into the pond and Georges hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep166
programme.desc: The Squeaky Boots - Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn / Banana - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep318
programme.desc: Paddington And The Skateboarder - Paddington becomes a heroic skateboarder, thanks to Mateo and a special mask - but how magical is the mask?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep516
programme.desc: Space Alien Adventure! - Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks its a snow monster and its scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep619
programme.desc: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer - After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins - Someone has been swiping fish off Capn Turbots boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut - Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching Detective Potato on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Bedtime - Its nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but its been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Traffic Jam - Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1019
programme.desc: Pups Save the Elephant Spa / Pups Save an Underwater Otis - While trying to save Traveling Travis, Ryder and the pups stumble across the legendary Elephants Spa. // Uncle Otis believes he's found gold but when Sid the Pirate tries to jump on Otis's claim, Otis gets trapped in a sunken shipping container.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1020
programme.desc: Pups vs. The Hum-Flectors / Pups Save a Capybara - A drone carrying Humdinger's reflecting panel crashes in a tree, the reflector concentrates a beam of light on a wooden bridge, causing it to burn. // The Paw Patrol rescues Winnie and a capybara when they go rolling off in a giant exercise ball.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Detective Baby Shark - When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep318
programme.desc: Paddington's Favourite Hero / Paddington And The Skateboarder - Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home. // Paddington becomes a heroic skateboarder, thanks to Mateo and a special mask - but how magical is the mask?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampaada? / If The Boot Fits / Piata Party - Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep613
programme.desc: Race to the Golden Gift - Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep318
programme.desc: Whale Of A Time / The Ice Roll - Sir Steel's noisy underwater antics cause a whale stampede. Deer Squad have to save the lost baby whale after the stampede! // Jade finds some strange footprints that may belong to an Ice Troll and calls the Deer Squad in to investigate.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep222
programme.desc: Findependence Day / Costello Quits - Fishy Force takes on a villain who steals all the treats in Carnivore Cove. // When Costello quits, Vigo sets out to be a supervillain without his henchfishy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Funny Fish / Club Cool - Goldie embraces her serious side to impress a director from Chomp City. // Everyfishy wants to join Shadow's cool new club.

programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze / Pups Save a Basketball Game - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdingers Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes A Roof - The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo - Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela. //Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise that caused them to lose their instruments.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Freeze Pops / Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking. // Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.desc: Paddington's Special Visitor - Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar?

programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodways purse chicken Chickaletta has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels / Pups Save a Roo - The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.desc: Pups Take the Cake - Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get their cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pigs office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbits job is all about numbers, Mrs Cats job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pigs job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppas playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie / Guacamole - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep614
programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep615
programme.desc: The Boingies! - When a bunch of adorable critters called Boingies get lost in Axle City, it's up to Blaze and AJ to gather them up and get them home safe and sound.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1021
programme.desc: Pups and Cats Save HumCatDingerMan / Pups Save A Turbot Tournament - Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan to steal the spotlight from the Cat Pack. // The pups must save Granny Tilly when an impromptu Turbot Tournament gets overly competitive.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1022
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talkative Mini Patrol / Pups Save the History of Adventure Bay - Alex dreams that his Mini Patrol animals can talk as they take the Bookmobile on a wild adventure! // Mayor Humdinger steals "The History of Adventure Bay," the book falls apart, and It's up to the Paw Patrol to retrieve it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Splish Spashketball / The Slug Hank Redemption - Baby, Vola, and William head to Hydrospace to take on Shadow's team in the Splashketball Finals. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Little Axolotl / Bubble Trouble - Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble and is heading straight for a volcano! Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep616
programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze - When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become: Special Mission Blaze!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep224
programme.desc: FLOWMO / Fishy Scouts - When all the other fishies are out of town during winter vacation, Baby and William create their very own fin-credible day of friendship. // Chucks takes a unique approach to camping on his first trip with the Fishy Scouts.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep225
programme.desc: Finloose / Operation Ernie - When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark will do whatever it takes to get the town dancing again! // Baby and William try to help Ernie make a best friend.

programme.desc: Pups Save an Ace / Pups Save a Wedding - When stunt pilot Ace runs into engine trouble, Its up to Skye and the PAW Patrol to save her and her plane so the air show can go on! // After a big storm, the PAW Patrol must save Farmer Yumi's barn in time for his wedding!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep310

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebeccas paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. programme.desc: From storm chasers to a rocket scientist and even an orchestra conductor, find out how the citizens of the lightning capital of the world, Singapore co-exist with nature's most spectacular light show.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Homeless In Singapore Ep1
programme.desc: Part 1: How I Hack Homelessness - It's often assumed the homeless must have done something wrong in their lives to fall into such a state. Follow the lives of three homeless individuals to understand the real reasons for homelessness.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day's events.

programme.title: Japan's Indo-Pacific Plan Ep1
programme.desc: Japan And China: Competition Or Cooperation? - Japan is investing in a series of infrastructure and supply chain resilience projects in ASEAN. Is this an alternative to China's Belt and Road Initiative? Will the two Asian giants cooperate or compete?

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep13
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep13
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC288SterlingvsCejudo

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep701
programme.desc: Marcus McGhee, Fighter Focus: Mike Malott, Front Row: Drew Dober, Day One: Dricus Du Plessis - Marcus McGhee details his journey from a turbulent life - to the bright lights of the UFC. Mike Malott looks back on his many walks to the Octagon as coach before making his mark in the Octagon. We join Drew Dober Front Row as he watched the lightweight contenders battle it out in Austin. And South African sensations Dricus du Plessis takes us back to his UFC debut.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC297StricklandvsDuPlessis
programme.desc: UFC returns to Toronto with two championship bouts. After an impressive victory over Israel Adesanya, Sean Strickland defends his middleweight belt for the first time against South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis. And in the co-main event, Raquel Pennington and Mayra Bueno Silva battle for the vacant women's bantanweight title. All this and more on Ufc Reloaded
